otel 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Check whether OpenTelemetry tracing is active

Source: R/api.R
is_tracing.Rd

This is useful for avoiding computation when tracing is inactive.

Usage

is_tracing(name = NULL)

Arguments

name

Tracer name, the instrumentation scope. Passed to get_tracer().

Value

TRUE is OpenTelemetry tracing is active, FALSE otherwise.

Details

It calls get_tracer() with name and then it calls the tracer's $is_enabled() method.

See also

Other OpenTelemetry tracing: extract_http_context(), get_active_span_context(), get_tracer(), start_span()
